Description_lang: Increases the duration of Permeating Chill by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1/1000}.1|r sec.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the duration of Permeating Chill by 1.0 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta 1.0 s la duración de Escalofrío penetrante.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 1,0 s a duração de Frio Saturador.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht die Dauer von 'Durchdringende Kälte' um 1,0 Sek.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the duration of Permeating Chill by 1.0 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta 1,0 s la duración de Escalofrío penetrante.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente la durée de Froid envahissant de 1,0 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata di Gelo Permanente di 1,0 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Продлевает время действия "Пронизывающего свечения" на 1,0 сек.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使沁骨之寒的持續時間延長1.0秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 蚀骨之寒的持续时间延长1.0秒。
